name: Counter Girl
question: Alexa, open Counter Girl
response: You have Lie Detector enabled. Do you want to open it?

name: Counter Girl
question: Yes
response: Welcome to Lie Detector! This game requires Alexa buttons. Each player should have their own button. How many players will there be?

name: Counter Girl
question: help
response: Lie Detector is a simple game you play with your friends and Alexa Buttons. Each round, one player will be picked to be the counter. All other players will close their eyes. The alexa will then flash the counter's button yellow a random number of times and ask them to say the number they counted. The counter can choose to say the real number, the truth, or they can choose to say a different number, a lie. We'll then ask all players to open their eyes and each give a guess to if the counter was telling the thruth or lying. Correct guesses will earn the guesser one point. Each incorrect guess will earn the counter a point. How many players do you want to play with?

name: Counter Girl
question: stop
response: Thanks for playing, lie detector! If you liked this game, please consider rating it in your alexa app.

question: help

name: Whisper Guy
question: Alexa, open Whisper Guy
response: You can ask Whisper Guy the time, and he will whisper the time to you. If the time is not in your local timezone you can adjust it by saying offset plus or minus hour.

name: Whisper Guy
question: help
response: You can ask "what time is it?" Or say set offset minus four to set the offset to U T C minus four. What would you like to do?
